thread.title: Geoff Evans
thread.title_full: Rickshaw Travel (AUS) reviewed by Geoff Evans

author: Geoff Evans
title: Geoff Evans
text: Rickshaw can only be as good as the local agents they work with. The blips over timing and other arrangemengs in Laos were entirely the responsibility of the in-country agent. Rickshaw has the responsibility to check all of tnis. In general a good holiday and would do another one with Rickshaw.
